codes.GOOD: Percentage rate expressed relative to the value of goods.
codes.PAYM: Percentage rate expressed relative to the payment amount.
codes.UNDG: Percentage rate expressed relative to the undertaking amount.

description: Specifies the external relative to code in the format of a character string with a maximum length of 4 characters. The list of valid codes is an external code list published separately.
name: ExternalRelativeTo1Code
